title: Week Review: Advanced Tense & Space
goal: Demonstrate mastery of spatial tenses and advanced temporal tools.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

inside → ?      outside → ?
above → ?       below → ?
front → ?       behind → ?
left → ?        right → ?

(Answers: nenri, bartu, gapru, cnita, crane, trixe, zunle, pritu)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Spatial Tenses

Cmavo Meaning
vi here (near)
va there (mid)
vu yonder (far)

Position Words

Lojban English
nenri inside
bartu outside
gapru above
cnita below
crane in front
trixe behind
zunle left
pritu right

Advanced Temporal Tools

Tool Function
Compound tenses puca'o, baco'a, puze'u
Sticky tense ki
Repetition roi

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate:

  1. nenri →
  2. gapru →
  3. crane →
  4. zunle →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. outside →
  2. below →
  3. behind →
  4. right →
Answers
  1. inside
  2. above
  3. in front
  4. left
  5. bartu
  6. cnita
  7. trixe
  8. pritu

Part B: Spatial and Temporal (8 points)

Translate:

  1. The cat is inside, nearby.
  2. The bird is above, far away.
  3. I was eating. (past + ongoing)
  4. I went twice.

Fill in:

  1. ___ = here/near
  2. ___ = there/mid
  3. puca'o = past + ___
  4. reroi = ___ times
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu nenri vi
  2. lo cipni cu gapru vu
  3. mi puca'o citka
  4. mi reroi klama
  5. vi
  6. va
  7. ongoing (ca'o)
  8. two

Part C: Narrative (4 points)

Translate using ki:

Write a 4-sentence past narrative:

  1. I walked to the mountain.
  2. I rested three times.
  3. I saw a bird above.
  4. I returned home.
Answer 
mi pu ki cadzu fa'a lo cmana
.i ciroi surla
.i viska lo cipni poi gapru
.i xruti lo zdani

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Describe a complete journey:

Use:

  • At least 3 position words
  • Spatial tenses (vi/va/vu)
  • Compound tenses
  • ki for sticky tense
  • roi for repetition

Example:

mi pu ki cadzu fa'a lo cmana vu
.i ciroi surla
.i puca'o sipna cnita lo tricu
.i ba bo viska lo cipni gapru
.i ri zunle mi
.i xruti lo zdani vi

(In the past: I walked toward the mountain far away. Rested three times. Was sleeping under a tree. Then saw a bird above. It was to my left. Returned home here.)

Week 25 Complete Reference

Vocabulary (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
nenri inside bartu outside
gapru above cnita below
crane in front trixe behind
zunle left pritu right

Grammar:

Tool Examples
Spatial tense vi, va, vu
Compound tense puca'o, baco'a, puze'u
Sticky tense pu ki, ba ki
Repetition paroi, reroi, so'iroi

Cumulative vocabulary: ~204 words

Summary

You completed Week 25 on advanced tense and space. You can now describe precise locations and complex temporal sequences.

Next week preview: Week 26 covers complex sentence nesting — nested abstractions, tu'a, and parsing practice.
